CustomField.description: If checked, S3-Files will not be immediately deleted from Salesforce. They will be moved to S3-Link Recycle Bin and stay there for a few days(configured here) and after that they will be auto deleted from Salesforce and Amazon S3 unless someone recovers them from S3-Link Recycle Bin.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, S3-Files will not be immediately deleted from Salesforce. They will be moved to S3-Link Recycle Bin and stay there for a few days(configured here) and after that they will be auto deleted from Salesforce and Amazon S3 unless someone recovers them from S3-Link Recycle Bin.
CustomField.label: Enable S3-Link Recycle Bin
